description:
On the 21st of April Mindera will open its doors and welcome everyone who wants to meet our Code and Culture.During this Open Day, you will have the opportunity to participate in our tech talks and workshops, have a job interview to join our fantastic team and know our offices (from where you can have a breathtaking Porto's view!).We have a self organising and politics free culture, where you can find opportunities to learn and develop with the support of likeminded and amazing people.Come and get to know us a little bit better - our culture, how we work and the technologies that passionate us!The agenda for the day is all about creating a great experience for all who wish to participate:11:00 - 11:30 - Welcome to Mindera (check-in for introductory interviews)11:30 - Talk - "Going live with Google Cloud Platform" (José Fonseca)11:30 - Workshop - "(Hello) Swift: from Playground to iOS app" (Renato Rodrigues)12:15 - Talk - "Supercharged Web Apps" (Tiago Nunes)13:00 - Lunch14:00 - Cultural Talk - "br3AtH1nG a§ hUm4n5" (Pedro Teixeira)14:30 - Talk - “God is a Monad” (Mehul Irá)15:00 - Talk - "From Services to Products... And then came Statful" (Hugo Valente)15:30 - Talk - "Mocked Test Scenarios with Selenium" (Ricardo Moura)16:00 - Closing
*Introductory interviews from 11:30 to 16:00 
See you there!
PS: Only 1 ticket per person.
name: Meet Mindera | Code & Culture
